Package org.appkit.templating.widget

Widgets that can be used with templating or stand-alone

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DatePicker for creating a component that is a DateTime
DatePicker.DateRange  
GridComposite for creating a component that is a Composite with a GridLayout
RadioSet a component that uses multiple Buttons to form a radio-set
Search for creating a component that aims to be a search-field
